content: "Meet Alexander, the 21-year-old demigod son of Aphrodite and a deceased veteran of the war in Iraq. As Aphrodite's champion, he is gifted with extraordinary powers and a magical relic that allows him to steal or borrow the abilities of immortal enemies, furthering Aphrodite's goal of increasing her power on Olympus. With his bravery and strength, Alexander is a force to be reckoned with in the world of gods and mortals alike."
